description.en:
Compilation of succubus stories originally released as doujin and then compiled in a volume of the same name.

0 - Short Story Bonuses
1 - I'm a Servant to These Small Succubi (Boku wa Chiisana Succubus no Shimobe) *
2 - Chu Chu Drain 1: Charm in Charm (Kiss Kiss Drain) (Boku wa Chiisana Succubus no Shimobe 2)
3 - Chu Chu Drain 2: Beastie Charm (Boku wa Chiisana Succubus no Shimobe 3)
4 - Chu Chu Drain 3: Lusty Charm (Boku wa Chiisana Succubus no Shimobe 4)
5 - Chu Chu Drain 4: Charms Party (Boku wa Chiisana Succubus no Shimobe 5)
6 - Chu Chu Drain 5: Eternity Charms (Boku wa Chiisana Succubus no Shimobe 6)
7 - Extra/Epilogue

*The doujin version of the chapter has some extras (character profile and short story). Check out the related doujin for those pages.

**TAGS**
**MALE** bondage, sole male
**FEMALE** ball sucking, blowjob, collar, crotch tattoo, cunnilingus, demon girl, domination loss, drill hair, femdom, footjob, garter belt, gloves, gothic lolita, handjob, heterochromia, horns, inverted nipples, leotard, lolicon, multimouth blowjob, multiple paizuri, nakadashi, paizuri, ponytail, smalldom, stirrup legwear, stockings, tail, tailjob, thigh high boots, twintails, unusual pupils, wings, x-ray
**MIXED** ffm threesome, group
**OTHER** story arc, tankoubon, uncensored
